p: Essential oil, light petroleum ether extract (PEE), dichloromethane extract (DCME), natural sesquiterpenes, (-)- trans-calamenene (1), cadalene (2), (-)-cubenol (3), (-)- epi-cubenol (4), (-)-torreyol (5), and 15-copaenol (6) were obtained from the heartwood of P. uviferum. All samples were obtained and analyzed according to methods described in previous studies ( Espinoza et al., 2016, 2018).
